gw.plugin.billing

Interface IBillingSystemPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IBillingSystemPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin used to communicate to a billing system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accountExists(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Find out if an account exists in the billing system.
      BillingPaymentInstrument addPaymentInstrumentTo(java.lang.String accountNumber, Currency currency, BillingPaymentInstrument paymentInstrument)
      Add a payment instrument to an account.
      void cancelPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod, java.lang.String transactionId)
      Cancel a policy period in the billing system.

      Create an account in the billing system.

      Create a new policy period in the billing system.

      Create a producer in the billing system.

      Create a producer code in the billing system.
      BillingMethod[] getAvailableBillingMethods(java.lang.String producerCode, Currency currency)
      Get all the billing methods that the given producer code supports.
      BillingLevel getBillingLevel(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Returns the BillingLevel for the given account number, or null if the BillingLevel is unknown (e.g., if the integration does not support BillingLevel).
      BillingPaymentInstrument[] getExistingPaymentInstruments(java.lang.String accountNumber, Currency currency)
      Retrieve existing payment instruments for an account.
      BillingInvoiceStreamInfo[] getInvoiceStreams(java.lang.String accountNumber, Currency currency, PaymentPlanData paymentPlan)
      Retrieves all invoice streams set up for the given account.

      Retrieve information about the policy period in the billing system.
      BillingAccountSearchResult[] getSubAccounts(java.lang.String parentAccountNumber)
      Retrieves all sub-accounts of the account with the given account number, or an empty array if none exist.
      BillingAccountSearchResult[] getSubAccounts(java.lang.String parentAccountNumber, Currency currency)
      Retrieves all sub-accounts of the account with the given account number and currency, or an empty array if none exist.

      Issue a final audit in the billing system.

      Returns all unapplied funds of this account.

      Search for accounts in the billing system using the supplied search criteria.

      Send charge breakdown criteria translations in the billing system.
      void setDownPaymentInstallmentTotalForAllInstallmentsPlans(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod, PaymentPlanData[] paymentPlans)
      Calculate and set the down payment, installment, and total, for all installments plans available in this period.
      boolean supportsSpecialHandlingForChangeInCost()
      Checks whether the billing system supports special handling for a change in the cost of a PolicyChange, Issuance, or Reinstatement.

      Synchronize the gw.pl.community.entity.Organization with values from the billing system's Producer.

    • Method Detail

      • searchForAccounts

        BillingAccountSearchResult[] searchForAccounts(BillingAccountSearchCriteriaJava searchCriteria,
                                               java.lang.Integer limit)
        Search for accounts in the billing system using the supplied search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - the search criteria
        limit - the maximum of number of results to return
        Returns:
        an array of search results
        Throws:
        DisplayableException - if there are too many results.

      • getInvoiceStreams

        BillingInvoiceStreamInfo[] getInvoiceStreams(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                             Currency currency,
                                             PaymentPlanData paymentPlan)
        Retrieves all invoice streams set up for the given account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        currency - currency of the invoice stream
        paymentPlan - the payment plan
        Returns:
        an array of invoice streams

      • getSubAccounts

        BillingAccountSearchResult[] getSubAccounts(java.lang.String parentAccountNumber)
        Retrieves all sub-accounts of the account with the given account number, or an empty array if none exist.
        Parameters:
        parentAccountNumber - identifies the parent account in the billing system
        Returns:
        flattened array of account results

      • getSubAccounts

        BillingAccountSearchResult[] getSubAccounts(java.lang.String parentAccountNumber,
                                            Currency currency)
        Retrieves all sub-accounts of the account with the given account number and currency, or an empty array if none exist.
        Parameters:
        parentAccountNumber - identifies the parent account in the billing system
        currency - currency of the sub-account
        Returns:
        flattened array of account results

      • transferPolicyPeriods

        void transferPolicyPeriods(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                           PolicyPeriod[] periods,
                           java.lang.String transactionId)
        Transfer specified policy periods to a new account in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        periods - array of policy period to be transferred
        transactionId - uniquely identifies this operation, and reused for retries during communication errors

      • accountExists

        boolean accountExists(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Find out if an account exists in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        Returns:
        true if the account exists in the billing system

      • createAccount

        java.lang.String createAccount(Account account,
                               java.lang.String transactionId)
        Create an account in the billing system. This typically happens when a new submission is bound.
        Parameters:
        account - the account
        transactionId - uniquely identifies this operation, and reused for retries during communication errors
        Returns:
        the external id of the account in the billing system

      • getAvailableBillingMethods

        BillingMethod[] getAvailableBillingMethods(java.lang.String producerCode,
                                           Currency currency)
        Get all the billing methods that the given producer code supports.
        Parameters:
        producerCode - the code of the producer code object
        Returns:
        an array of billing method

      • createPolicyPeriod

        java.lang.String createPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                                    java.lang.String transactionId)
        Create a new policy period in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period
        transactionId - uniquely identifies this operation, and reused for retries during communication errors
        Returns:
        the external id of the policy period in the billing system

      • retrieveAllPaymentPlans

        PaymentPlanData[] retrieveAllPaymentPlans(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Get all payment plans in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period
        Returns:
        the payment plans from the billing system

      • retrieveAllPaymentPlans

        PaymentPlanData[] retrieveAllPaymentPlans(BillingMethod billingMethod,
                                          java.lang.String altBillingAccountNumber,
                                          Currency preferredSettlementCurrency)
        Get all payment plans in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        billingMethod - the billing method used
        altBillingAccountNumber - string of account number to be billed
        preferredSettlementCurrency - currency of payment plan to be returned
        Returns:
        the payment plans from the billing system

      • retrieveAllCommissionPlans

        CommissionPlanSummary[] retrieveAllCommissionPlans()
        Get all commission plans in the billing system.
        Returns:
        an array of commission plan summary

                                    java.lang.String transactionId)
        Create a producer code in the billing system.
        Parameters:
        producerCode - the producer code
        transactionId - uniquely identifies this operation, and reused for retries during communication errors
        Returns:
        the external id of the producer code in the billing system

                                                       PaymentPlanData paymentPlan)

        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period
        paymentPlan - the payment plan
        Returns:
        The payments preview.

        Returns:

      • getExistingPaymentInstruments

        BillingPaymentInstrument[] getExistingPaymentInstruments(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                         Currency currency)
        Retrieve existing payment instruments for an account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        currency - The currency of the (splintered) account
        Returns:
        an array of billing payment method

      • addPaymentInstrumentTo

        BillingPaymentInstrument addPaymentInstrumentTo(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                Currency currency,
                                                BillingPaymentInstrument paymentInstrument)
        Add a payment instrument to an account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account number identifying the account in the billing system
        currency - The currency of the (splintered) account
        paymentInstrument - the payment instrument
        Returns:
        the new payment instrument

      • updatePolicyPeriodTermConfirmed

        void updatePolicyPeriodTermConfirmed(java.lang.String policyNumber,
                                     int termNumber,
                                     boolean isConfirmed)
        Updates the TermConfirmed field on the given policy period.
        Parameters:
        policyNumber - The policy number for which the term confirmed field should be updated
        termNumber - The term number for this policy
        isConfirmed - The new value

      • retrieveAccountUnappliedFunds

        BillingUnappliedFundInfo[] retrieveAccountUnappliedFunds(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                         Currency currency)
        Returns all unapplied funds of this account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        currency - The currency of the (splintered) account
        Returns:
        an array of unapplied funds

      • supportsSpecialHandlingForChangeInCost

        boolean supportsSpecialHandlingForChangeInCost()
        Checks whether the billing system supports special handling for a change in the cost of a PolicyChange, Issuance, or Reinstatement.
        Returns:
        true if the billing system supports special handling for a change in the cost of a PolicyChange, Issuance, or Reinstatement false otherwise

      • getBillingLevel

        BillingLevel getBillingLevel(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns the BillingLevel for the given account number, or null if the BillingLevel is unknown (e.g., if the integration does not support BillingLevel).
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account in the billing system
        Returns:
        the BillingLevel of the account in the billing system as identified by the account number, or if the account is not found in the billing system return a default specified by PolicyCenter. Return null when BillingLevel is not supported.
